actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE public.template_table SET
		col2 = '{{update_form.formData.col2}}',
    col3 = '{{update_form.formData.col3}}',
    col4 = '{{update_form.formData.col4}}',
    col5 = '{{update_form.formData.col5}}',
    col6 = '{{update_form.formData.col6}}',
    col7 = '{{update_form.formData.col7}}',
    col8 = '{{update_form.formData.col8}}',
    col9 = '{{update_form.formData.col9}}',
    col10 = '{{update_form.formData.col10}}',
    col11 = '{{update_form.formData.col11}}',
    col12 = '{{update_form.formData.col12}}'
  WHERE col1 = {{data_table.selectedRow.col1}};

UPDATE public.template_table SET
		col2 = '{{update_form.formData.col2}}',
    col3 = '{{update_form.formData.col3}}',
    col4 = '{{update_form.formData.col4}}',
    col5 = '{{update_form.formData.col5}}',
    col6 = '{{update_form.formData.col6}}',
    col7 = '{{update_form.formData.col7}}',
    col8 = '{{update_form.formData.col8}}',
    col9 = '{{update_form.formData.col9}}',
    col10 = '{{update_form.formData.col10}}',
    col11 = '{{update_form.formData.col11}}',
    col12 = '{{update_form.formData.col12}}'
  WHERE col1 = {{data_table.selectedRow.col1}};

INSERT INTO public.template_table (
	col1,
	col2,
	col3,
	col4,
	col5,
	col6,
	col7,
	col8,
	col9,
	col10,
	col11,
	col12
)
VALUES (
	'{{insert_form.formData.col1}}',
	'{{insert_form.formData.col2}}',
	'{{insert_form.formData.col3}}',
	'{{insert_form.formData.col4}}',
	'{{insert_form.formData.col5}}',
	'{{insert_form.formData.col6}}',
	'{{insert_form.formData.col7}}',
	'{{insert_form.formData.col8}}',
	'{{insert_form.formData.col9}}',
	'{{insert_form.formData.col10}}',
	'{{insert_form.formData.col11}}',
	'{{insert_form.formData.col12}}'
);

INSERT INTO public.template_table (
	col1,
	col2,
	col3,
	col4,
	col5,
	col6,
	col7,
	col8,
	col9,
	col10,

	col12
)
VALUES (
